tituloFijo: First you will need a Wallet

bloques.texto: Imagine a digital wallet on your phone that, instead of holding money or credit cards, stores verifiable credentials. Think of them as important documents, but in a secure digital format (ID, passport, degrees, etc.).

Verifiable credential wallets give users full control over their data. You decide what information to share and with whom. For example, if you only need to prove your age to access a service, you just share your date of birth without revealing your full ID.
First, install one of the compatible applications on your smartphone. You can view the QR code by tapping on the icons.

modalItems.title: Download Privado ID on your phone
modalItems.sub: Scan this QR code with your phone or use the store buttons. You can also search for "Privado ID" in your app store.
